fixmesh.self_intersections package¶

fixmesh.self_intersections.local¶

fixmesh.self_intersections.local_remesh.fix_with_localRemesh(mesh, detail=2.4)[source]¶

Fix self-intersections and remesh joint sections.

Parameters:

  • mesh (pymesh.Mesh) – The input mesh with self-intersections.

  • detail (float, optional) – The value controls the finess of the remesh. Defaults to 2.4.

Returns:

The repaired mesh with no self-intersections.

Return type:

pymesh.Mesh

fixmesh.self_intersections.meshlib¶

fixmesh.self_intersections.meshlib.fix_with_meshlib(file_path, voxel_size=0.01)[source]¶

Fix self-intersections using MeshLib.

Parameters:

  • mesh (pymesh.Mesh) – The input mesh with self-intersections.

  • voxel_size (float, optional) – The voxel size. Defaults to 0.01.

Returns:

The repaired mesh with no self-intersections.

Return type:

pymesh.Mesh

fixmesh.self_intersections.pymesh¶

fixmesh.self_intersections.pymesh.fix_with_pymesh(mesh)[source]¶

Fix self-intersections using PyMesh.

This function calls pymesh.compute_outerhull().

Parameters:

mesh (pymesh.Mesh) – The input mesh with self-intersections.

Returns:

The repaired mesh with no self-intersections.

Return type:

pymesh.Mesh

fixmesh.self_intersections.pymeshfix¶

fixmesh.self_intersections.pymeshfix.fix_with_pymeshfix(mesh)[source]¶

Fix self-intersections using PyMeshFix.

Parameters:

mesh (pymesh.Mesh) – The input mesh with self-intersections.

Returns:

The repaired mesh with no self-intersections.

Return type:

pymesh.Mesh

fixmesh.self_intersections.surfacenet¶

fixmesh.self_intersections.surfacenet.fix_with_surfaceNet(mesh, voxel_size=0.01)[source]¶

Fix self-intersections using the 3D SurfaceNet.

This function voxelizes each watertight component of the mesh, assigns unique labels to components, and reconstructs the mesh surface using 3D SurfaceNet. (Original Work: Sarah F. Frisken, SurfaceNets for Multi-Label Segmentations with Preservation of Sharp Boundaries, Journal of Computer Graphics Techniques (JCGT), vol. 11, no. 1, 34-54, 2022.)

Parameters:

  • mesh (pymesh.Mesh) – The input mesh with self-intersections.

  • voxel_size (float, optional) – The voxel size. Defaults to 0.01.

Returns:

The repaired mesh with labels.

Return type:

pyvista.PolyData

fixmesh
